posts.name: Chris_Elston
posts.cooked:
Does anyone need any used or new Talon SRX Speed controllers? We have about 14-18 of these used and new in the shop and would like to sell them if someone needs any. Wasn’t sure if there was any interest in this or not. We also have some brand new Vex speed controllers in the box as well.

We also have a version 1 Limelight forsale too. The bigger box, we might have 2 actually if anyone is interested.

posts.name: Edwin Mendija
posts.cooked: Do you mean the Victor SPX?

user_custom_fields.user_field_4: Head Coach, Molokai High School Robotics

posts.custom_user_title: Head Coach, Molokai High School Robotics

posts.cooked:
I think he means talon srx

Talon SRX Motor Controller

Price: USD 89.99

posts.name: Chris_Elston
posts.cooked:
Sorry, I assumed, make an offer on any of this if it helps anyone. We don’t use it anymore.

So we have like 4-6 of these brand new in a box:

Victor SPX Motor Controller

Price: USD 49.99

And we have like 14 used of these Talon SRX and some new in a box, I forgot to count them all.

Talon SRX Motor Controller

Price: USD 89.99

We also have 1 or 2 version 1 Limelight we aren’t using anymore if that helps anyone. It’s the larger size. Make an offer.

posts.name: Nathan Nguyen
posts.cooked: What prices would you be selling them at?

posts.name: Debsnil

posts.name: Mr. Siefen | 453
posts.cooked:
If anyone is curious the Talon SRX and VictorSPX can both be driven via PWM or CAN via the same lines. If you do PWM you just use one of the can lines and leave the other disconnected. It’s outlined in the manuals. These make great random project controllers with basic Arduino Write microseconds for PWM. We use these for our Goose bot and other random projects where we don’t want to give up a full RoboRio to control them via CAN. These can definitely be used outside of FRC.

Edit: I’d buy some more but I have about 20 already… Many in use but I don’t need any more at the moment

posts.name: Chris_Elston
posts.cooked: I sent you a message, just reply there.
